title: Lone Tree Ginger Apple
creator: Lone Tree
description: Canada's best cider in a can. Lone Tree's ginger cider gives a strong punch of ginger but with some of the sweetness of the apple underneath to just balance it out.
subject: ginger; semi-dry; can

title: Lone Tree Dry
creator: Lone Tree
description: Drinkable but extremely dry and hard to detect the flavor.
subject: dry; can

title: Rock Creek Dry
creator: Rock Creek
description: A very good dry cider.
subject: dry; can

title: Creek and Gully Apricot Dry
creator: Creek and Gully
description: A decent cider but the apricot isn't noticeable enough, and a little drier than preferred.

title: Bramble Bubbly
creator: Sea Cider
description: A lovely sweet berry cider.
subject: blackberry; semi-dry; bottle

title: Salt Spring Wild Maple Bourbon Apricot
creator: Salt Spring Wild
description: A surprising combination of flavors that bring sweetness but also a little bitterness.
subject: bourbon; apricot; semi-dry; bottle

title: No Boats on Sunday Original Cider
creator: No Boats on Sunday
description: A solid basic apple cider. The cidery creates different versions of each of their products with apples from the region of Canada where it is sold. This one was made with apples from British Columbia.
subject: can

title: Cherry Lane
creator: Sea Cider
description: An excellent cherry flavor.
subject: cherry; semi-dry; bottle

title: Kings and Spies
creator: Sea Cider
description: A solid "off-dry" cider, about as good as dry ciders get for me.
subject: dry; bottle

title: Local Legend
creator: Schilling Cider House
description: An apple cider served aboard the ferry between Victoria and Seattle.
subject: can; semi-dry

title: Sparkling White Currant, Apple & Honey Cider

description: A very good "off-dry" cider with alot of little different flavors filling it out.

title: Ch-Ch-Ch-Cherry Bomb
creator: Valley Cider Company
description: Valley Ciders tend to be blends with other things, but they do it much better than some others, and this is a solid cherry cider.
subject: cherry; dry; can; blends

title: Merri Berry
creator: Merridale
description: Berry flavors in cider for me? Don't mind if I do.
subject: black currant; cherry; raspberry; can; sweet

title: Persephone Brewing Company Rhubarb Ginger
creator: Persephone Brewing Company
description: The rhubarb and ginger are both a little too sublte but a solid mostly dry cider.

title: Lone Tree Mimosa Cider Cocktail
creator: Lone Tree
description: It is a blend so takes a hit for that, but I will grant it does bring the mimosa flavor profile. It says dry on the can but I would call it sweet personally.
subject: mimosa; blend; dry; can

title: Lone Tree Rhubarb
creator: Lone Tree
description: A decent rhubarb cider but not bringin the rhubarb as strongly as they do the ginger.
subject: rhubarb; dry; can

title: Okanagan Black Cherry
creator: Okanagan Cider and Beverage Company
description: Like others of the brand, this is more a cider-flavored vodka cocktail when you look at the ingredients. Too sweet.

creator: Okanagan Cider and Beverage Company
description: Like others of the brand, this is more a cider-flavored vodka cocktail when you look at the ingredients. Too sweet.

title: Okanagan Crisp Apple
creator: Okanagan Cider and Beverage Company
description: Like others of the brand, this is more a cider-flavored vodka cocktail when you look at the ingredients. It is too sweet, although the fact that apple is the only flavor makes it a little better because the excessive sweetness doesn't drag the apple down as much as the other flavors.

title: Salt Spring Wild Ginger Root
creator: Salt Spring Wild
description: An excellent ginger cider with a punch only excelled by Lone Tree's ginger cider.
subject: ginger; bottle; semi-dry

title: Merridale Traditional
creator: Merridale
description: This was a weird one. The waitress was confused when she brought it to me because she thought it smelled like beer, and in fact it had a distinct beer/hops flavor to it, while also being far too sweet for beer. Quite possibly someone didn't clean the tap so I treat this rating as quesitonable.
subject: dry; tap

title: Mo-Morro
creator: Merridale
description: Dry but with blood orange juice mixed in which gave a nice flavor.
subject: dry; tap; blood orange

title: Merridale Ginger
creator: Merridale
